duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary point of contact for company and franchise operated restaurants, providing timely and accurate responses to inquiries and requests.
Respond to operations-related questions (e-mail/phone) from both company and franchise restaurant management; enter complete and detailed information regarding inquiry into the system database.
Provide exceptional service, follow-up with customers to assure advice/information provided was satisfactory, and act as the primary communication source during high scope events.

Consult with resources to obtain answers to customers' questions, make recommendations to adjust training materials, participate in new product teams, act as admin to third-party platforms, and manage operations meetings.
Support QDOBA's organization system and structure, proactively reach out to restaurant management and field leadership with performance updates and suggestions for improvement.
Perform other related duties, tasks, and responsibilities as required.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, G.E.D. or equivalent required. Bachelor’s degree in business administration or related field preferred.
